translation: To those who are ever steadfast, worshipping me with love, I give the yoga of discrimination, by which they come to me.
commentary: 10.10 their to them? of those who are constantly steadfast? worship (of the) worshipping? lovingly with love? I give (I) give? Buddhiyogam Yoga of discrimination? That's him? Yen by which? Me to Me? Upayanti come? They they.Commentary The devotees who have dedicated themselves to the Lord? who are ever harmonious and selfabiding? who are ever devout and who adore Him with intense love (not for attaining
